price: Odoo beektanii qormaanni isaanii Gooftaa kiyya qofa irra malee hin taane.
arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā ʿalā rabbī law tashʿurūna
